John Zaffis, Jeff Belanger, Rosemary Guiley, Bonnie Vent, CC Carole =

v, Paranormal Quests, Haunted Earth, Seekers of the Paranormal, the list ke=
eps growing. It's an amazing site to be able to watch paranormal shows 24/7=

rs are adding to the mix over there. There is much more coming!! I find it =

re looking for people interested in covering the EVP-ITC aspect as well so =
if you are a researcher who is interested then you can submit your video/sh=
